summary: Removes the warpaint on Aela\'s face along with the black makeup. - Subconscious
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=300][color=red][b]. . : : Alternate Aela : : . .[/b][/color][/size][/center]



[size=4][color=#87fdce][b]Description:[/b][/color][/size][size=4][color=white][b] Removes the warpaint on Aela\'s face along with the black makeup.[/b][/color][/size][size=4][color=red][b] THIS IS NOT A NEW SKIN TEXTURE. THIS WILL NOT REPLACE ANY OF YOUR SKIN, FACE, BODY TEXTURES. THIS JUST REMOVES THE WARPAINT AND BLACK MAKEUP ON AELA\'S FACE. THIS WILL NOT AFFECT ANY OTHER NPC :][/b][/color][/size]





[center][size=7][color=red][b]---> IF YOU NEED A BETTER EXPLANATION OF WHAT THIS MOD DOES JUST LOOK AT THE IMAGES SECTION <---[/b][/color][/size][/center]





[size=4][color=#87fdce][b]Installation:[/b][/color][/size] 

[list]
[*] [size=4][color=white][b]Download the folder named \"Alternate Aela\".[/b][/color][/size] 
[*] [size=4][color=white][b]Open up the archive folder.[/b][/color][/size] 
[*] [size=4][color=white][b]Drag and drop the \"textures\" folder into your Skyrim/Data folder.[/b][/color][/size] 
[*] [size=4][color=white][b]Overwrite if asked.[/b][/color][/size]
[*] [size=4][color=white][b]Enjoy![/b][/color][/size][/list]













[center][size=300][color=#FFFC17][b][S].[U].[B].[C].[O].[N].[S].[C].[I].[O].[U].[S][/b][/color][/size][/center]
author: Subconscious
